content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 2, Everton 1.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 2, Everton 1.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Everton 1. Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal.
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Everton 0. Willian (Chelsea) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Jonjoe Kenny.
Foul by Tom Davies (Everton).
Pedro (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Ademola Lookman (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Leighton Baines following a set piece situation.
Foul by Davide Zappacosta (Chelsea).
Leighton Baines (Everton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Offside, Chelsea. Cesc Fàbregas tries a through ball, but Álvaro Morata is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Davide Zappacosta (Chelsea) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Álvaro Morata.
Substitution, Chelsea. Álvaro Morata replaces Michy Batshuayi.
Foul by Oumar Niasse (Everton).
Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Everton. Oumar Niasse replaces Wayne Rooney.
Ademola Lookman (Everton) hits the bar with a left footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Kevin Mirallas.
Attempt missed. Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) left footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Davide Zappacosta.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) because of an injury.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Phil Jagielka.
Attempt missed. Ademola Lookman (Everton) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Tom Davies with a through ball.
Foul by Leighton Baines (Everton).
Willian (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt blocked. Kevin Mirallas (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Leighton Baines.
Substitution, Everton. Ademola Lookman replaces Aaron Lennon.
Attempt missed. Tom Davies (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Leighton Baines following a set piece situation.
Foul by Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea).
Kevin Mirallas (Everton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Chelsea. Pedro replaces Charly Musonda.
Attempt missed. Willian (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Michy Batshuayi.
Attempt saved. Kevin Mirallas (Everton) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Andreas Christensen (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton).
Attempt saved. Phil Jagielka (Everton) header from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Leighton Baines with a cross.
Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Kevin Mirallas (Everton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea).
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Antonio Rüdiger.
Substitution, Everton. Dominic Calvert-Lewin replaces James McCarthy.
Substitution, Chelsea. Cesc Fàbregas replaces Daniel Drinkwater.
Phil Jagielka (Everton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Phil Jagielka (Everton).
Charly Musonda (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Kenedy.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Antonio Rüdiger.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Willy Caballero.
Attempt saved. Wayne Rooney (Everton) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Kevin Mirallas with a headed pass.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Ethan Ampadu (Chelsea) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Jonjoe Kenny (Everton) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Wayne Rooney.
James McCarthy (Everton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by James McCarthy (Everton).

Tom Davies (Everton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Ethan Ampadu (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Foul by Tom Davies (Everton).

Kenedy (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jonjoe Kenny (Everton).
Second Half begins Chelsea 1, Everton 0.
First Half ends, Chelsea 1, Everton 0.
Attempt missed. Davide Zappacosta (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Willian following a fast break.
Attempt blocked. Willian (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Jonjoe Kenny (Everton).
Charly Musonda (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Davide Zappacosta (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Everton 0. Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea) header from the right side of the six yard box to the top left corner. Assisted by Charly Musonda with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Phil Jagielka.
